comment.author: 27398485@N08
comment._content: Third Dynasty 2649-2575 BC -  Step mastaba Pyramid of Pharaoh Djoser  reconstructed in art illustration - AKA Pharoh Djozer, Zoser -  reputed to be the design of physician architect Imhotep, who was revered (with his own temples) for nearly 1,000 yrs, as the God Protector of architects and physicians.  Discovery that honey held infections away, and other medical advances also attributed to Imhotep.
